description: This header file declares internal functions for an HTTP message parser used in a BroadWay Service Delivery System component. It provides prototypes for parsing, locating fields, saving field data, boundary detection, and form data handling within HTTP messages.

methods.name: HttpSmpoLocateFieldData
methods.description: Locates specific field data within an HTTP message, identifying start positions and offsets across boundary-describing buffers.

methods.name: HttpSmpoSaveFieldData
methods.description: Saves field data extracted from an HTTP message to a file, with optional flushing of the message body.

methods.name: HttpSmpoFindNextBoundary
methods.description: Finds the next multipart boundary within an HTTP message buffer for parsing multipart content.

methods.name: HttpSmpoGetFormField
methods.description: Retrieves a form field value from an HTTP message boundary segment.

methods.name: HttpSmpoCopyFormData
methods.description: Copies form data into a buffer, returning the data length and buffer size.

methods.name: HttpSmpoCopyFormData2
methods.description: Copies form data between specified boundary segments into a buffer, managing offsets and buffer sizes.
